what: Functions to convert files to parquet format
title: Functions to convert files to parquet format
text: R package allows convert databases different formats (csv, SAS, SPSS Stata) parquet format.

title: Functions to convert files to parquet format
Functions to convert files to parquet format
text: package simple wrapper useful functions “haven”, “readr” “arrow” packages. Feel welcome contribute add features find useful daily work.

what: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
title: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
text: function allows convert csv table parquet format.

title: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
code: csv_to_parquet(   path_to_csv,   url_to_csv,   csv_as_a_zip = FALSE,   filename_in_zip,   path_to_parquet,   compression_type = "snappy" )

title: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
text: path_to_csv string indicates path csv file url_to_csv string indicates URL csv file csv_as_a_zip boolean indicates csv stored zip filename_in_zip name csv file zip (useful several csv included zip). Required `csv_as_a_zip` TRUE. path_to_parquet string indicates path directory parquet file stored compression_type string indicates compression type parquet file (see https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/reference/write_parquet.html). Can equal "snappy" (default), "gzip", "brotly", "lz4", "zstd" "none".

title: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
text: Several conversion possibilities offered : locally stored file. argument `path_to_csv` must used; URL. argument `url_to_csv` must used.

title: Convert a csv table to parquet format — csv_to_parquet
code: if (FALSE) { # Conversion from a local csv file :  csv_to_parquet(   path_to_csv = "Data/ac1.csv",   path_to_parquet = "Data", )  # Conversion from a URL and a csv file :  csv_to_parquet(   url_to_csv = "https://stats.govt.nz/assets/Uploads/Research-and-development-survey/Research-and-development-survey-2021/Download-data/research-and-development-survey-2021-csv.csv",   path_to_parquet = "Data", )  # Conversion from a URL and a zipped file :  csv_to_parquet(   url_to_csv = "https://www.insee.fr/fr/statistiques/fichier/3568617/equip-tour-transp-infra-2021.zip",   csv_as_a_zip = TRUE,   filename_in_zip = "equip-tour-transp-infra-2021.csv",   path_to_parquet = "Data", ) }
